title: Global Preferences
description: Configure global settings for your Booklore instance, including cover image handling, search preferences, and file upload limits.

covers.regenerateDesc: Regenerates cover images for all books from the embedded covers in the file.
covers.verticalCroppingDesc: Automatically crop extremely tall images (like web comics) from the top to create usable cover thumbnails.
covers.horizontalCroppingDesc: Automatically crop extremely wide images from the left to create usable cover thumbnails.
covers.aspectRatioDesc: Images with aspect ratios exceeding this threshold will be cropped. A value of 2.5 means images more than 2.5x taller (or wider) than normal will be cropped.
covers.smartCroppingDesc: Skip uniform colour regions when determining where to crop. Focuses the cover image on the most relevant content.

search.autoBookSearchDesc: Automatically attempts metadata matching when the book information panel is opened.
search.similarBookDesc: Enables or disables similar book recommendations based on your library.

fileManagement.maxUploadDesc: Defines the maximum allowed size (in MB) for each uploaded file. Applies to EPUB, PDF, CBZ, CBR, and CB7 formats.
fileManagement.restartWarning: Changes will take effect after restarting the server
fileManagement.invalidInputDetail: Please enter a valid max file upload size in MB.

telemetry.telemetryDesc: Help improve Booklore by sharing anonymous usage statistics. This data lets the developers see which features are most used, identify bugs, and spot performance issues so they know what to work on next. No personal information, book content, or any identifiable data is ever sent. Data is sent to the Booklore server automatically once every 24 hours. It's completely safe and very helpful to the developers.

settingsError: There was an error saving the settings.
